
config raspberry pi
-------------------

 sudo raspi-config
   -> eg. set keyboard
          change user password



show network info : 


* ip:

      ifconfig
      ip addr
  
* route:  

      netstat -rn
      route -n
      ip route
   
* dns:
   
  /etc/resolv.conf     
    => to set or get dns servers config  src: http://superuser.com/questions/617796/how-do-i-set-dns-servers-on-raspberry-pi 
  eg.
    $ cat /etc/resolv.conf
    # Generated by resolvconf
    domain science.ru.nl
    nameserver 131.174.30.69
    nameserver 131.174.224.4

  
*  host 
 
      $ host -v cup
      Trying "cup"
      Host cup not found: 3(NXDOMAIN)
      Received 96 bytes from 131.174.117.20#53 in 315 ms
                              `-> dns server
 
* restart network
     
         sudo /etc/init.d/networking restart
            or
         sudo /etc/init.d/networking reload
